import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postcode}

 } export default PlaceOrderScreen
